subject: Mathematics
subs: describe and determine the volume and surface area of rectangular prisms and cylinders; and
solve problems, including practical problems, involving the volume and surface area of rectangular prisms and cylinders.

text: The student will solve problems, including practical problems, involving the relationship between corresponding sides and corresponding angles of similar quadrilaterals and triangles.
subject: Mathematics
Mathematics
subs: compare and contrast quadrilaterals based on their properties; and
determine unknown side lengths or angle measures of quadrilaterals.

text: The student will apply translations and reflections of right triangles or rectangles in the coordinate plane.
subject: Mathematics
